alert.note: Alert for Kent; Queen Anne's (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 4:01PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern New Castle, northern Kent, northeastern Queen Anne`s and northeastern Kent Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 400 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Massey, or 11 miles southwest of Middletown, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dover, Smyrna, Camden, Clayton, Cheswold, Millington, Woodside, Hartly, Sassafras, Green Spring, Hazlettville, Delaney Corner, Massey, Dover Speedway, Wyoming, Galena, Kenton, Leipsic, Rodney Village and Kent Acres. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
